definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
fan/sliding, hinged or detachable flat part of sth/classifier for doors, windows etc
to fan/to slap sb on the face

sentences.english: Because It's very hot in summer in Beihai, so I have buy a fan to got the cool!
sentences.chinese: 因爲五月份天氣比較熱，所以，新買了一臺的電風扇。

sentences.english: I improved our assembly line of the electric fans.
sentences.chinese: 作爲電機工程師，我改進了電風扇的裝配線。

sentences.english: Please insure the electric fans at 120% of the invoice value.
sentences.chinese: 請將電風扇按發票金額的120%保險。

sentences.english: I would like to discuss with you the problem of agency for your electric fans.
sentences.chinese: 人念同貴方商談你們電風扇的代理成績。

sentences.english: The boy sitting under the electric fan is the best in our class.
sentences.chinese: 坐在電風扇下的男孩是我們班上最好的學生。

sentences.english: The propeller is just a big fan in front of the plane used to keep the pilot cool.
sentences.chinese: 螺旋漿其實只是一個能讓飛行員感到涼快的大電風扇。

sentences.english: Then we went to buy an electric fan.
sentences.chinese: 接着我又去了買了一臺電風扇。

sentences.english: Twice his small electric fan broke down.
sentences.chinese: 他的小電風扇壞了兩次。

sentences.english: Wanxiang sells joint bearings, Midea sells electric fans, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 萬向銷售傳動軸承，美的銷售電風扇，等等。

sentences.english: I helped them create some new businesses such as electric fans and electro-watches.
sentences.chinese: 我幫他們開拓了一些新業務，比如電風扇和電度表。

sentences.english: As long as is fanner blows what people feel comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 只要是電風扇吹，讓人感到舒適。

sentences.english: Turn on the electric fan to air the room please.
sentences.chinese: 打開電風扇，讓房間通風。

sentences.english: I want to bargining with you about the power of attorney of fanner.
sentences.chinese: 我想同貴方商談你們電風扇的代理問題。

sentences.english: Our apartment didn't even have a fan.
sentences.chinese: 我們的公寓甚至連電風扇都沒有。

definition: to raise a lantern and fight at night (idiom); fig. to work into the night/to burn the midnight oil
